keywords: ['bell ringing lesson', 'small church bells', 'male voice', 'russian', 'instructive speaking']
caption: This is the recording of a bell ringing lesson video. There is a set of three small church bells being played in various ways. There is a male voice speaking in an instructive manner on how to ring the bells. He is speaking in the Russian language. This recording can be sampled for use in beat-making. The bell sample could also fit well as a sound effect in a cartoon or a movie.
